body.name: Digital Camera, FHD 4K Autofocus Vlogging Camera 48MP 16X Digital Zoom Digital Camera with 32GB Memory Card YouTube Portable Compact Small Camera for Teens Adult Beginner Kids
features: 【4K Full HD Digital Camera & 48MP】Anteam digital camera captures high-resolution photos and videos with the 48MP CMOS sensor and 4K Full HD video recording. Whether you're sharing your adventures or starting a YouTube channel, this camera delivers crisp and detailed shots that will make your memories come to life.

【Autofocus Function】Say goodbye to blurry shots! The autofocus function ensures your subjects are sharp and in focus, whether you're capturing fast-moving action or delicate close-ups. Enjoy the ease and precision of automatic focusing.

【16x Digital Zoom】The video digital camera get up close and personal or capture distant scenes with ease using the 16x digital zoom. This feature provides versatile framing options, allowing you to adapt to various shooting scenarios and ensuring you never miss a shot.

【2.8" IPS screen & LED Light】Our compact camera compose your shots with confidence using the 2.8" IPS screen, which offers a clear view of your subject and camera settings. Plus, the built-in LED light enhances your shooting capabilities in low-light conditions, ensuring your photos and videos shine in any environment.

【Complete Package】The portable vlogging camera includes a 32GB SD card and 2 rechargeable batteries, you can start shooting right away and store plenty of photos and videos without the hassle of buying additional memory cards and keep capturing memories without interruption. This complete package provides everything you need for a seamless and enjoyable photography and videography experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ultra-High Definition 4K Video This digital camera is equipped with 4K video recording capabilities, delivering unparalleled video quality. Capture moments with exceptional clarity, rich colors, and stunning detail, ensuring your videos stand out with cinematic brilliance.

High-Resolution 48MP Photography With a high-resolution image sensor, this camera excels in photography as well. Capture sharp and detailed photos with vibrant colors, making it perfect for capturing still images.

Fast and Precise Autofocus The autofocus system ensures your subjects are sharp and in focus, even in challenging conditions. This feature is invaluable for capturing fast-moving subjects or achieving precise close-ups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, great quality, compact
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera for an upcoming wedding. I didn’t want to use my phone. This is perfect for any occasion really. I’ve tried it outdoors and indoors. It takes great landscape pictures as well as portraits. It has different settings so you can get that money shot every time. You can also leave it on auto settings which still captures beautiful images. I love all the accessories it comes with. The extra battery is great as back up. It also includes a wrist strap, and a neck strap if you want to walk around hands-free, as well as a small bag for storage. Definitely recommend this camera!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect pocket-sized camera!
reviews.reviewText: I was needing something compact to supplement my iPhone when it came to taking photos… especially as someone who creates content for fun and wants to include her phone in lifestyle shots from time to time.This little guy packs just enough punch and, for the price, is extremely versatile since it can perform as a webcam and record video files, too. Photo quality is nice, yielding large files that can then be run through editing apps. It’s very no-fuss and has a simple interface that is easy to navigate. Audio is clear.The cherry on top is the fun array of candy-coated colors; I chose the lilac! All in all, this is a handy point-and-shoot that is friendly on the wallet and is a nice change up (and throwback to the early 00’s digital camera age) to the smartphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loving My New Anteam Camera - Total Bang for Your Buck!
reviews.reviewText: Just picked up the Anteam 4K camera, and guys, it's a game-changer. Seriously, for the price, I wasn't expecting much, but wow, was I wrong!First off, this thing is super affordable. I mean, getting a camera this good without emptying your wallet? Yes, please! It's like they packed in all the high-end features but forgot to add the hefty price tag.And let's talk about how easy it is to carry around. It's so light and compact, I barely notice it in my bag. Plus, it came with straps, so it's always ready for action, whether I'm hitting the city streets or the trails.Now, the features – it's like they crammed a professional camera into this little package. The photos and videos are crisp and clear, thanks to the 48MP sensor and 4K video. The autofocus is a lifesaver, especially for action shots where I used to get just blurs. And the zoom? I can get close-ups without getting, well, close up.But the best part? It came with everything – two batteries, a memory card, you name it. I was out shooting the minute I unboxed it, no extra shopping needed.So, if you're on the fence about this camera, just go for it. It's honestly made capturing moments so much fun, without draining my bank account. Big thumbs up from me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Teen Girl review!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely adore this camera. It is so user friendly and come with 2 battery’s, that already arrive fully charged. This product came with a lens wipe, a neck band and a wrist strap. There are so many setting and filter options that will help you to achieve the perfect image you’re looking for. I’m obsessed with the quality of this product. I didn’t expect much in quality because the price was so cheap, but it is perfect. My only concern about this is sometimes when i’m in the middle of taking a picture the camera does shut of, but it’s not to big of an issue. As i’ve used it, this problem of it shutting of hasn’t occurred as often as it used to. I definitely recommend this camera!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We got this camera with the idea that the kids could use it but I ended up liking it for myself as well! It came with 2 batteries which I loved, a lanyard, wrist strap, pouch/bag, and micro chip. The camera itself is a good size and feels nice in your hand. It’s very simple to operate and get good pictures but if you want to really look into things it has a lot more options and extras then I thought it would. I still need to learn some of them so I’m excepted to see what else I can do. I forgot how much nicer pictures can be even on a simple camera in comparison to a phone camera. Kids love it & I love it so it’s a definite win.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best purchase for my daughter 😍
reviews.reviewText: My five year old loves this camera. She has been taking photos everyday with it since it came, and the best camera I’ve found for kids. I’m really impressed by the quality. It’s super user friendly, and the picture quality is so much better than cameras I’ve purchased for her in the past. I love that it also stores lots of photos for her on the memory card. It also captures photos clearly with a little movement, which is perfect for little movers. I would highly suggest this for any little adventurers who want to capture those memories along the way. It was the perfect gift for my daughter and her most used gift this Christmas. She’s obsessed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Autofocus FHD 4K Vlogging Camera in a delightful light purple shade, and I must say it exceeded my expectations. The 48MP resolution and 16X digital zoom provide stunning clarity and detail in every shot. The autofocus feature ensures crisp and sharp images, making it a reliable choice for capturing precious moments. The inclusion of a 32GB memory card adds convenience, allowing ample storage for all my photos and videos. Its portability is a definite plus, making it easy to carry on the go. Overall, this camera combines functionality with aesthetics, offering an excellent vlogging experience. Highly recommended!

Caméra pour des enfants, les instructions pour opération de la caméra, sont très limités et il est difficile de les comprendre. De plus les instructions devraient être dans divers langues (français, espagnol, ect.)

No macro option; can't crop pictures; can't adjust brightness, contrast, saturation, etc.; menus difficult to understand and navigate - it keeps bumping you out of the menu you're in and you have to go back and start over; overall poor picture quality - picture is washed out. Returning!
